Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: RESULTS : L - NOARG sub - chronic administration produced tolerance of L - NOARG and of haloperidol - induced catalepsy .

| Disease |
| --- |
| chronic administration |

Note: I've identified "chronic administration" and "haloperidol - induced catalepsy" as potential disease entities in the given paragraph. "Chronic administration" refers to the long-term or continued use of a drug or medication, which can lead to various health issues or drug tolerance. "Haloperidol-induced catalepsy" is a condition where the individual becomes immobile and unresponsive due to the administration of the drug haloperidol.

Explanation: In the given paragraph, "haloperidol-induced catalepsy" is the only clear disease entity. "Chronic administration" refers to the method of drug delivery, not a disease itself.
